CustomField.formula: Reimbursement_Requested_Salary__c + Reimbursement_Requested_Benefits__c + Requested_Amount_Submitted__c + IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_Indirect_Rate__c, 'Yes'), IF(FirstPic_National_Org_Code__c = 'BBBSA', Requested_Indirect_Rate_Amount__c, Requested_Indirect_Costs__c), 0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Reimbursement_Requested_Salary__c + Reimbursement_Requested_Benefits__c + Requested_Amount_Submitted__c + IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_Indirect_Rate__c, 'Yes'), IF(FirstPic_National_Org_Code__c = 'BBBSA', Requested_Indirect_Rate_Amount__c, Requested_Indirect_Costs__c
CustomField.label: Total Reimbursement Requested Amount
